description.p: Returns the cosine of an angle expressed in radians.

returns.return:
result N>
Returns the cosine of an angle expressed in radians.

discussion.p: The Cos function returns the cosine of an angle expressed in radians.

example.caption: Cos() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 cos(1.8) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = -0.227202094693087
